title: Hotel reservation confirmations and booking vouchers
dataVerified: Guest name, hotel, check-in/out dates, room type, rate, booking reference
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Booking status (confirmed/completed/cancelled). Link to hotel/OTA system (guest and property, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake hotel bookings (scam properties on fake booking sites). Domain binding verifies hotel/OTA (Booking.com, Expedia). Prepaid rate verification. Prevents booking modification fraud. No-show charge documentation.
